typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Type as string,
		Origin as string,
		DriveTrain as string,
		Length as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> carscsv
carscsv derive(Modified_Model = replace(Model, 'a','replacedText')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
